disableTitleChange.label: Disable Title Hijacking
disableTitleChange.description: Prevent websites from including baiting text through the title to grab the user's attention when switching to other tabs.

removeBackgroundEffects.label: Remove Background Effects
removeBackgroundEffects.description: Disables animated backgrounds, such as falling petals, snowflakes, or other canvas-based effects.

removeMusicPlayer.label: Remove Music Player
removeMusicPlayer.description: Hides the auto-playing background music player often found on personal blogs.

removeCustomCursor.label: Remove Custom Cursor
removeCustomCursor.description: Restores the default system mouse pointer, disabling any custom cursors or pointer trail effects.

removeLive2D.label: Remove Live2D Widget
removeLive2D.description: Hides the animated character widget, usually located in the corner of the screen.

removeClickEffects.label: Remove Click Effects
removeClickEffects.description: Disables colorful words, sparkles, or other effects that appear when you click the mouse.
